alert.note: Alert for Traill (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 17 at 2:22PM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Forks ND has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Dakota... Goose River at Hillsboro affecting Traill County. .Snowmelt river flooding to continue. Rate of rise and ultimate crest is uncertain due to rate of ongoing snowmelt runoff and possible rain and colder temperatures in the forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Goose River at Hillsboro. * WHEN...From late Tuesday night until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, MODERATE FLOOD. The city park in Hillsboro starts to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:15 PM CDT Monday the stage was 3.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Wednesday and continue rising to 12.5 feet Thursday. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
